description: Enables the Baidu channel for an application or updates the status and settings of the Baidu channel for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

parameters.name: BaiduChannelRequest
parameters.description: Specifies the status and settings of the Baidu (Baidu Cloud Push) channel for an application. The API key that you received from the Baidu Cloud Push service to communicate with the service. Enabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether to enable the Baidu channel for the application. The secret key that you received from the Baidu Cloud Push service to communicate with the service.

nested_params.name: ApiKey
nested_params.description: The API key that you received from the Baidu Cloud Push service to communicate with the service.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether to enable the Baidu channel for the application.

nested_params.name: SecretKey
nested_params.description: The secret key that you received from the Baidu Cloud Push service to communicate with the service.

nested_items.name: BaiduChannelResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the status and settings of the Baidu (Baidu Cloud Push) channel for an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the Baidu channel applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the Baidu channel was enabled.

nested_items.name: Credential
nested_items.description: The API key that you received from the Baidu Cloud Push service to communicate with the service.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the Baidu channel is enabled for the application.

nested_items.name: HasCredential
nested_items.description: (Not used) This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) An identifier for the Baidu channel. This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: IsArchived
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the Baidu channel is archived.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last modified the Baidu channel.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the Baidu channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The type of messaging or notification platform for the channel. For the Baidu channel, this value is BAIDU.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the Baidu channel.
